title: "Kys" isnt insta ban anymore?
body: Som i had a guy on my game that tole me to kms a lot. I reported him after game and didnt get instentfeedback report. Why? You get it if the report you made this game got him banned  (on one of the other 9) dosent it? Sorry if i didnt understand.

replies.body: It doesn't give you feedback every time.
pretty sure you didnt understand what i said.

> [{quoted}](name=letsfeedtogether,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=MtoxiRP1,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-02-14T12:11:12.168+0000)
>
> pretty sure you didnt understand what i said.

We understood what you said. If you didn't say what you meant, I suggest marshaling your thoughts and making another attempt.
"You get it if the report you made this game got him banned"  what's so hard to understand

Its not hard to understand, its just untrue. 

TLDR: you are wrong
You do realise you don't get instant feedback report every time
pretty sure you didnt understand what i said.

> [{quoted}](name=letsfeedtogether,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=MtoxiRP1,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-02-14T12:10:47.915+0000)

''I reported him after game and didnt get instentfeedback report. Why? You get ifr if the report you made this game got him banned (on one of the other 9) dosent it? Sorry if i didnt understand.''

You don't get an instant feedback report every time someone gets banned from your report
yes, you didnt understand what i said

Then you say that you're supposed to get the report if they get banned from your ban, right?
And then you say that you're sorry if you didn't understand correctly

Something else to add?

you're supposed to get the report if they get banned from your ban, right  yes. i didnt ever say 

"get instant feedback report every time"

lmao wtf

What's the point of this post? We've accomplished the fact that you don't get feedback report every time someone gets banned etc so why are you asking if the K word isn't bannable anymore? Because it is and they most likely got banned but you just didn't get the feedback report because you don't get it every time, like me and few others have been saying

> [{quoted}](name=letsfeedtogether,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=MtoxiRP1,comment-id=0004000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-14T13:04:47.793+0000)

which is also not true

or......?

Give up dude, lol.

letsfeedtogether: The sky is green.

Everyone else: no, it really isn't

letsfeedtogether: omg MOM, you dont understand what i'm saying!

> [{quoted}](name=Kanzler,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=MtoxiRP1,comment-id=000400000000000000000000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2019-02-15T22:18:58.018+0000)
>
> Give up dude, lol.
> 
> letsfeedtogether: The sky is green.
> 
> Everyone else: no, it really isn't
> 
> letsfeedtogether: omg MOM, you dont understand what i'm saying!

LMAo

Nope.  You don't get one if they are BANNED. You get one if they are PUNISHED. That could mean a Ban yes, but it could mean a chat restriction as well.  And you do not get them every single time a punishment is applied, it only sends one every now and then to show that the system is working.
Did you report it as hate speech or just verbal abuse?
verbal abuse

> [{quoted}](name=letsfeedtogether,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=MtoxiRP1,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-02-14T12:11:42.626+0000)
>
> verbal abuse

There's your problem. Hate Speech from what I heard tends to raise flags faster if you're reported for it than just the verbal abuse category, so the system will be slower to pick up on that and think it's just a case of a player being negative to their team. Or so I heard.
The IFS notification is highly unreliable, so don't always expect to get one even if the person you reported got punished.

> [{quoted}](name=letsfeedtogether,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=MtoxiRP1,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-02-14T07:30:25.930+0000)
>
> You get it if the report you made this game got him banned  (on one of the other 9) dosent it? Sorry if i didnt understand.

So you are asking if you get it if the report you made this game got him banned, right? Thats why you say "doesnt it?" Right? So the answer is, no you dont always get it. Sorry if i didnt understand your question.

Also you ask if kys isnt insta ban anymore. That, I do not know. Last I heard though, it is instant 14 day ban. Pretty sure it still is.
Whats wrong with Kissing Your Sallad?

You get 1 free "0" tolerance word. I guess it should be renamed Single Tolerance, but whatever. Riot wont admit it, but I've seen quite a few situations where people who only say it once dont ever get that 2-week ban.
Same happened to me, feels bad I was waiting for that report :((
